堪へる: (たへる) - to bear; to stand; to endure; to put up with
堪まる: (たまる) - to bear (often adds emphasis); to endure
堪らない: (たまらない) - intolerable/unbearable/unendurable; irresistible/tremendous/out of this world; (after 〜て／〜で form) cannot help (doing)/cannot but do/anxious to do
堪り兼ねる: (たまりかねる) - to be unable to bear (something) any longer; to be unable to put up with (something) any longer
堪る: (たまる) - to bear (often adds emphasis); to endure
堪忍ぶ: (たえしのぶ) - to put up with; to endure; to bear patiently
堪忍袋: (かんにんぶくろ) - one's store of patience
堪忍袋の緒が切れる: (かんにんぶくろのおがきれる) - to be out of patience; to be unable to put up with something anymore
堪能: (tannou) - proficiente, habilidoso; desfrutando, satisfação, saciedade, tendo o suficiente (de)
堰: (えん) - Represa, barragem, represa, barreira, comporta
堰き止める: (せきとめる) - to dam up/to hold back/to keep back/to bring to a halt/to intercept; to stem (an activity)/to check (e.g. progress)
堰き止め湖: (せきとめこ) - dammed lake (formed by natural damming of a river, esp. by landslide, volcanic eruption, etc.)
堰き止湖: (せきとめこ) - dammed lake (formed by natural damming of a river, esp. by landslide, volcanic eruption, etc.)
堰を切ったよう: (せきをきったよう) - gushing forth; bursting out
堰を切る: (せきをきる) - to break a dam and gush forth; to burst out
堰板: (せきいた) - sheeting; sheathing board; cover
堰止め湖: (せきとめこ) - dammed lake (formed by natural damming of a river, esp. by landslide, volcanic eruption, etc.)
堰止湖: (せきとめこ) - dammed lake (formed by natural damming of a river, esp. by landslide, volcanic eruption, etc.)
報い: (むくい) - reward; recompense; return; punishment; retribution
報いる: (むくいる) - to reward/to recompense/to repay; to retaliate/to get revenge
報う: (むくう) - to reward; to recompense; to repay
報える: (こたえる) - (応える, 報える only) to respond/to answer/to meet (e.g. demands, expectations); (sometimes 堪える)  to affect/to take a toll/to strike home/to have an effect on/to be hard on someone (e.g. heat, cold, work, illness, etc.)/to be a strain
報じる: (ほうじる) - to inform; to report
報ずる: (ほうずる) - to inform; to report
報せる: (しらせる) - to notify; to advise; to inform
報ゆ: (むくゆ) - (v2y-k,vt)   to reward; to recompense; to repay
報告可能マーク誤り: (ほうこくかのうマークあやまり) - reportable markup error
報告対象メッセージ: (ほうこくたいしょうメッセージ) - subject message
報告対象打診: (ほうこくたいしょうだしん) - subject probe
報告書ファイル: (ほうこくしょファイル) - report file
報告書レコード: (ほうこくしょレコード) - report writer logical record
報告書作成: (ほうこくしょさくせい) - report generation; report writing; report writer
報告書作成管理システム: (ほうこくしょさくせいかんりシステム) - report writer control system; RWCS
報告書節: (ほうこくしょせつ) - report section
報告書脚書き: (ほうこくしょあしがき) - report footing
報告書行: (ほうこくしょぎょう) - report line; line
報告書記述項: (ほうこくしょきじゅつこう) - report description entry
報告書頭書き: (ほうこくしょあたまがき) - report heading
報告発生源認証: (ほうこくはっせいげんにんしょう) - report origin authentication
報告者: (ほうこくしゃ) - reporter; speaker; informer; presenter; rapporteur
報告集団: (ほうこくしゅうだん) - report group
報告集団記述項: (ほうこくしゅうだんきじゅつこう) - report group description entry
報奨: (ほうしょう) - bonus; bounty; reward; compensation
報奨金: (ほうしょうきん) - cash bonus; reward; bounty
報復措置: (ほうふくそち) - reprisals; retaliatory measures
報復行為: (ほうふくこうい) - act of retaliation
報恩: (ほうおん) - repaying a kindness; gratitude
報恩講: (ほうおんこう) - memorial services for the founder of the sect (esp. for Shinran in Shin Buddhism)
報知抄録: (ほうちしょうろく) - informative abstract
報謝: (ほうしゃ) - repaying a favor; repaying a favour
報身: (ほうしん) - sambhogakaya (reward body, form taken by a buddha after completing its role as a bodhisattva)
報連相: (ほうれんそう) - (from 報告・連絡・相談) reporting, contacting, and consultation
報道の自由: (ほうどうのじゆう) - freedom of the press
報道写真: (ほうどうしゃしん) - news photograph
報道官: (ほうどうかん) - press office; spokesperson
報道局: (ほうどうきょく) - news bureau; press bureau
報道機関: (ほうどうきかん) - information media; press; news organs
報道番組: (ほうどうばんぐみ) - news program; news programme
報道関係者: (ほうどうかんけいしゃ) - news media; news organization; newspeople; people in the press
場: (jo/ba) - place , place, spot, space; field, discipline, sphere, realm; occasion, situation; scene (of a play, movie, etc.)
場ちがい: (ばちがい) - out-of-place; inappropriate; sticking out like a sore thumb
場つなぎ: (ばつなぎ) - filling in (e.g. between speakers at a meeting, acts at a show); material used to fill in (between speeches at a meeting, etc.); anecdote
場なれ: (ばなれ) - experience; being accustomed (to something); poise in a critical situation
場の古典論: (ばのこてんろん) - classical field theory
場の量子論: (ばのりょうしろん) - quantum field theory
場を取る: (ばをとる) - to occupy much space
場を離れる: (ばをはなれる) - to leave (a scene); to step away
場内: (じょうない) - (ant: 場外) on the grounds
